participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: imaginative and playful, with a touch of sadness due to loneliness.
participant_1.background: i'm a little girl. i'm very lonely. i have superpowers. i live in the cloud. i like to make time stop.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: energetic and a bit rebellious, loves sports but struggles with academics.
participant_2.background: i'm 13 years old. i ride the bus to school. i hate math class. i'm on the soccer team.
